1.0.1.name: wordpress/zarinpal-simple-shopping-cart
1.0.1.description: WordPress Simple Zarinpal Shopping Cart allows you to add an 'Add to Cart' button on any posts or pages. It also allows you to add/display the shopping cart on any post or page or sidebar easily. The shopping cart shows the user what they currently have in the cart and allows them to remove the items. It can be easily integrated with the NextGen Photo Gallery plugin too.
